hero.headline: Legal solutions trusted by businesses,
hero.subheadline: Expert legal guidance and comprehensive solutions for your business and personal needs. Get started with a free consultation today.

about.title: Trusted Legal Excellence Since 1984
about.description: For over four decades, Esquivel & Asociados has been the premier legal advisor to multinational corporations, international investors, and individuals from over 70 nationalities doing business in, relocating to, or establishing permanent residence in Panama. Our expertise in cross-border transactions and local compliance has made us the go-to firm in Central America.
credentials: Trusted by Fortune 500 Companies in Panama
about.quote: We don't just provide legal services – we build lasting partnerships with our clients, understanding their unique needs and delivering solutions that drive real results.

contact.title: Get Your Free Legal Consultation
contact.description: Ready to discuss your legal needs? Contact us today for a free, confidential consultation with one of our experienced attorneys.

hero.title: Panama Visa & Immigration
hero.subtitle: Services
hero.description: Expert assistance with all visa types for Panama. Our experienced immigration attorneys have helped over 15,000 clients from 70+ countries to successfully obtain their Panama visas and residency permits.

programs.title: Panama Visa Programs
programs.description: We handle all types of visas and residency permits for Panama

work_visa.title: Work Visa
work_visa.description: For individuals seeking employment opportunities in Panama.

investor_visa.title: Investor Visa
investor_visa.description: For entrepreneurs and investors establishing business in Panama.

retirement_visa.title: Retirement Visa (Pensionado)
retirement_visa.description: For retirees with pension income who plan to establish monthly income.

family_visa.title: Family Reunification Visa
family_visa.description: Family members can be sponsored depending on relationship.

friendly_nations.title: Friendly Nations Visa
friendly_nations.description: Streamlined visas for residents of 50+ countries with diplomatic ties to Panama.

tourist_extension.title: Tourist Visa Extension
tourist_extension.description: Extend your visa beyond the standard 90 day period.

process.title: Our Visa Application Process
process.description: A streamlined approach that has successfully served thousands of clients

steps.title: Initial Consultation
steps.description: Meet with our immigration specialists to assess your eligibility and determine the best visa program for your needs.

steps.title: Document Preparation
steps.description: We guide you through gathering and processing all required documentation. Experience in translation services.

steps.title: Application Submission
steps.description: We submit your application to immigration authorities and handle all communication with the government.

steps.title: Follow-up & Approval
steps.description: We manage the process through approval ensuring timely responses to any government requests.

benefits.title: 40+ Years of Experience
benefits.description: Since 1984, we've been helping international clients navigate Panama's immigration system successfully.

benefits.title: 70+ Nationalities Served
benefits.description: Our multilingual team has successfully processed visas for clients from every corner of the world.

benefits.title: Government Relationships
benefits.description: Strong relationships with regulatory authorities ensure prompt and efficient processing of your application.

benefits.title: Full-Service Support
benefits.description: From initial consultation to our approval and beyond, we're with you every step of the way.

cta.title: Start Your Visa Application Today
cta.description: Get a free consultation with our immigration specialists

footer.description: Providing exceptional legal services with integrity, expertise, and dedication to achieving the best outcomes for our clients since 1984.
